projects.title: Performant Custom Web Element Viewer
projects.description: Built a perfomant 3D Viewer that was light (180kb) and utilised techniques such as maintaing one render raster per webpage to get over the WebGL Context Limit, the external link showcases a demo of it having 200 viewer in a single page without crashing (Apple MacBook Pro Mid-2018)

projects.title: Progressively Enhanced Web 3D Experiences
projects.description: Built a mechanism with which large 3D Models / Experiences could be loaded in a web browser with progressive enhancement on the fly utilising a web worker.
